content.question: All of the following led Congress to impose Radical Reconstruction measured EXCEPT the

choices.label: enactment of Black Codes by southern legislatures
outbreak of race riots in New Orleans and Memphis
massive exodus of former slaves from the South
election of former Confederates to Congress
response of southern legislatures to the Fourteenth Amendment

content.answer: massive exodus of former slaves from the South

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
